meanings.definition: The making of fine leather shoes or boots.
meanings.sent1: The cordwainery of the artisan resulted in exquisite footwear.
meanings.sent2: I visited a cordwainery to buy a new pair of leather boots.
meanings.sent3: The cordwainery was so skilled that even the shoes danced on their own!
meanings.sent4: Her cordwainery was like crafting magic into every step.
meanings.sent5: The smell of leather in the cordwainery filled the air with promise.

meanings.definition: A shop or factory where cordwainery is practiced.
meanings.sent1: We toured the cordwainery to see how shoes were made.
meanings.sent2: The cordwainery was bustling with activity as workers crafted shoes.
meanings.sent3: In the cordwainery, the shoes seemed to whisper secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The cordwainery hummed with the rhythm of skilled hands at work.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the cordwainery felt like stepping into a world of craftsmanship.

meanings.definition: The trade or occupation of a cordwainer.
meanings.sent1: His dedication to cordwainery made him a master in his field.
meanings.sent2: Cordwainery requires precision and passion for leatherwork.
meanings.sent3: She proudly declared her love for cordwainery at every opportunity.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, cordwainery is a timeless art.
meanings.sent5: The essence of cordwainery is woven into the fabric of history.
